thread.title: BRIEF-Methanex Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.70

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Methanex Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.70
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Methanex Corp:
* METHANEX REPORTS HIGHER FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS AND INCREASES DIVIDEND BY 10%
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.70 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.09 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* METHANEX - EXCLUDED FROM ADJUSTED NET INCOME IN QUARTER, HAD $37 MILLION NON-CASH CHARGE IN REVALUATION OF NET DEFERRED TAX ASSET DUE TO TAX REFORM IN U.S.
* QTRLY REVENUE $861 MILLION VERSUS $585 MLN‍​ * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.81 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
